clean_data: Oracle Database Administrator Oracle span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan Oracle Database Administrator General Motors Canton GA Over 8 years experience as an Oracle Database Administrator in a 24x7 production business system setting Bachelors degree in Computer Engineering and Masters degree in Information Systems Oracle Database 11g Administrator Certified Professional 11g OCP Oracle Database 10g Administrator Certified Professional 10g OCP Successfully upgraded multiple Oracle databases from 10g to 11g 11g to 12C Worked in a 247 mission critical environment supporting of production database services to ensure the highest standards of availability resilience integrity security and performance Good working knowledge of Oracle RAC ASM Golden Gate Data Guard both physical and logical Experience with database backup restore and recovery using RMAN Good experience applying quarterly patches to Oracle databases An impressive communication and creative problem solving skills Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator General Motors Roswell GA February 2014 to Present Work as a part of a 25 person Operation DBA team providing production support for over 2000 Production oracle databases primarily in an Oracle 11g 12c RAC Golden Gate and Data Guard environments Coordinates and collaborate with internal organizations and internal business partners such as innovation DBAs security compliance UNIX system administrators Database Engineers and Storage Engineers Foster virtual team collaboration working with team members in three other Innovation Centers through out the United States along with team members in Europe and Brazil Monitor the health of 115 assigned databases Shift lead in 24 x7 rotational on call support Performs oracle software software upgrades and quarterly PSU patches Used Grid Control for system performance tuning and monitoring One of GMs Security DBAs that ensures that sox databases are compliant and audit ready Perform refreshes on oracle databases One of the OEM Support DBAs that install configure and manage Oracle Agent Grid Control and 13c Cloud Control Perform Day to day administration of Oracle Databases Assist the innovation team in building databases of various complexities ranging from standalone RAC ASM and Dataguard Perform Disaster recovery using an Oracle Data Guard fail over solution and completed several planned switchovers Configure and use RMAN backups for Hot and Cold backups Perform Recovery of Oracle Databases Trained new Oracle DBAS on day to day procedures Oracle Database Administrator IBM Dubuque IA February 2014 to April 2014 Worked with a team of 12 DBAS supporting two Accounts State of Georgia and State of California with over 500 Databases These databases range in size from 2 gigs to 25 Terabytes Performed regular maintenance to oracle 11g 10g 9i and 8i databases Interfaced with account management to resolve critical situation issues Performed oracle software client and oracle grid infrastructure installation for a standalone server Performed single server database installations with without ASM Applied Oracle patches to databases Performed database upgrades from oracle 10g to oracle 11g Managed 4 node Oracle 10g Real Application Clusters RAC databases with ASM Storage Configured and use RMAN for hot and cold backups Implemented home grown scripts scheduled via crontab for redundant database monitoring Monitored backup operations and schedules manual backups as needed Created users schemas and performed imports and exports of oracle schemas Worked with system administrators and nfigure the system for optimal performance Created and monitored data files controlfiles tablespaces and archivelogs Monitored space usage and adjust database as needed Performed Security Health Checks including user privileges user profile review database parameter preview and security revalidation remediation Used Grid control for system performance tuning and monitoring Monitored Oracle trends for hardware usage and user load Planned and coordinated data migrations between systems Assisted senior DBA in maintaining documentation lessons learned best practices and quality improvement documentation Maintained strong relationships with all lines of business and business units through customer focused service delivery Contacted Oracle Support for assistance on problems which are beyond internal capabilities to resolve Trained new hires and Junior DBAs on day to day procedures PC Tech State Personnel Administration Atlanta GA September 2010 to December 2010 Provided computer systems support to over 100 endusers by troubleshooting and resolving hardware and software issues Built and restored workstation images Maintained accurate uptodate inventory records of all computer equipment printers and software licenses Contributed a technology article published in the monthly online newsletter for state employees Provided
